name: Persona 4: The Ultimate in Mayonaka Arena
overview:
Persona 4 Arena, known in Japan as Persona 4: The Ultimate in Mayonaka Arena, is a fighting video game co-developed by Atlus and Arc System Works for arcades.

Based on Atlus' Persona role-playing video game series, Arena serves as a direct sequel to the 2008 title, Shin Megami Tensei: Persona 4, additionally featuring characters from its predecessor, Shin Megami Tensei: Persona 3.
